microprocessor.name: SRC-TCP [Module] Exterior Lighting v1.4.0-dev7
microprocessor.description: Interacts with the lighting module, UI, and lightbox to control exterior lighting

node.label: UI
node.description: Connects to Instruments or Display Controller // Channels: B5: Head Lights (toggle); B6: High Beams (toggle); B7: Work Lights (t

node.label: Lightbox Extender & Instrument Panel
node.description: Outputs information to both the Lightbox Extender and Instrument Panels // Channels: B4: Front Headlights (toggle); B5: Rear Hea

object.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} labels = {"Auto","Head","High","Work","Warn","Deco"} state = {} out = {}
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press=gB(1) night=gB(3) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
for i=1,#labels do state[i] = gB(9+i) out[i] = false end
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
for i=0,1,1 do for j=0,2,1 do if (onPress(6+i*28,24+j*12,24,9)) then k=i+1+j*2 + 1 if (k <= 6) then out[k] = true end end end end
for i=1,#labels do sB(i, out[i]) end
pre=gB(1) end
function dOpt(x,y,w,h,t,tog) if tog then setC(theme.fg) else setC(theme.bg2) end dRF(x,y,w,h) if tog then setC(theme.bg2) else setC(theme.fg) end dTB(x+3,y,w-4,h,t,-1,0) setC(theme.fg) dL(x,y,x,y+9) end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() setC(theme.bg2) s.drawClear() for i=0,1,1 do for j=0,2,1 do k=i+1+j*2 + 1 if (k <= 6) then dOpt(6+i*28,24+j*12,24,9,labels[k],state[k]) end end end end

i.l: Head and tail lights on both ends
Head and tail lights on both ends

c58.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} labels = {"Auto","Head","High","Work","Warn","Deco"} state = {} out = {}
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press=gB(1) night=gB(3) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
for i=1,#labels do state[i] = gB(9+i) out[i] = false end
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
for i=0,1,1 do for j=0,2,1 do if (onPress(6+i*28,24+j*12,24,9)) then k=i+1+j*2 + 1 if (k <= 6) then out[k] = true end end end end
for i=1,#labels do sB(i, out[i]) end
pre=gB(1) end
function dOpt(x,y,w,h,t,tog) if tog then setC(theme.fg) else setC(theme.bg2) end dRF(x,y,w,h) if tog then setC(theme.bg2) else setC(theme.fg) end dTB(x+3,y,w-4,h,t,-1,0) setC(theme.fg) dL(x,y,x,y+9) end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() setC(theme.bg2) s.drawClear() for i=0,1,1 do for j=0,2,1 do k=i+1+j*2 + 1 if (k <= 6) then dOpt(6+i*28,24+j*12,24,9,labels[k],state[k]) end end end end

i.l: Head and tail lights on both ends
Head and tail lights on both ends
